auth.signIn.title: Sign in
auth.signUp.title: Create your account
auth.signUp.subtitle: Join LikeThem and start discovering curated fashion
auth.signUp.terms: By creating an account, you agree to our
auth.error.OAuthAccountNotLinked: This email is already associated with another account. Please log in using the original method.
auth.error.OAuthCreateAccount: We couldn't create your account. This usually means a duplicate email or a database constraint. Please contact support with error code: OAuthCreateAccount
auth.error.OAuthSignin: Error initiating Google sign-in. Please try again.
auth.error.OAuthCallback: There was an error during Google sign-in (OAuth callback). This may be due to a configuration issue. Please try again or contact support if this persists.
auth.error.Configuration: Authentication configuration error. Please contact support.
auth.error.EmailCreateAccount: Error creating account with email. Please try again.
auth.error.CredentialsSignin: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
auth.error.generic: Sign-in error: {error}. Please contact support with this error code if the issue persists.
auth.validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth.validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.validation.accountCreatedSignInFail: Account created but sign-in failed. Please try signing in.
auth.validation.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
auth.validation.googleSignInFailed: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.
auth.validation.googleSignInError: An error occurred during Google sign-in.
explore.title: Discover Curators
explore.subtitle: Explore closets by the creators you admire. Fresh posts, curated daily.
explore.noResults: No results. Try a different search.
explore.filter.noMatch: No curators match your filters. Try adjusting them.
curator.tooltips.general: Public pieces curated by this creator.
curator.tooltips.inner: Exclusive pieces from the curator's personal wardrobe. Access required.
curator.tooltips.drops: Limited-time releases curated by this creator.
curator.innerNarrative: These are personal pieces selected directly from the curator's wardrobe.
curator.emptyState: No products in this closet yet.
curator.noActiveDropDesc: {name} doesn't have an active drop right now.
curator.followForDrops: Follow them to be notified when they launch their next drop!
product.oneOfAKind: This is a one-of-a-kind item owned and worn by the curator.
product.shippingDesc: Ships from the curator within 3–5 business days.
product.returnsDesc: Returns accepted within 48 hours of delivery if item condition matches description.
product.unavailable.notFound.title: This item is no longer available
product.unavailable.notFound.description: This piece may have been removed or is no longer available.
product.unavailable.sold.title: This piece has been sold
product.unavailable.sold.description: One-of-a-kind pieces go fast. Explore more from this curator.
access.modal.title: Exclusive Access Required
access.modal.description: Enter a curator access code to unlock purchasing and add items to your cart.
sell.title: Sell Like Them
sell.subtitle: Turn your wardrobe into a store. Join curators selling their favorite pieces.
account.savedItems.title: Saved Items
account.savedItems.empty: You haven't saved any items yet.
admin.curator.identity.bioPlaceholder: Write a short bio for the curator (max 280 characters)
admin.curator.identity.urlError.instagra: Instagram URL must start with https:// or http://
admin.curator.identity.urlError.tiktok: TikTok URL must start with https:// or http://
admin.curator.identity.urlError.youtube: YouTube URL must start with https:// or http://
admin.curator.identity.urlError.website: Website URL must start with https:// or http://
apply.form.name: Name
apply.form.motivation: Why should you be part of LikeThem?
apply.form.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us about your style, your community, and why you'd like to curate a store…
apply.form.success: Application submitted successfully! We'll get back to you by email.
apply.form.terms: By submitting, you agree to be contacted by LikeThem. We don't share your data with third parties.
apply.signInRequired: Please sign in to submit your application.
